attributes.action: Remove Mrs Priti Sushil Patel from government office immediately.
attributes.additional_details:
Bullying in 2015, going against British values
Scandalous involvement in property development
Breached ministerial code by discussing state affairs with Israel under the guise of a private holiday for personal gain, lying in the process only to have been made to admit failure and apologise
Further revelations of abuse of authority in relation to business with Israel
Bullying in 2020 - against the grain of British values, again
Failure to account for the loss of over 400,000 criminal records
attributes.background: For breaches to the integrity of Great Britain, its values and its law abiding citizens, the named person presently serving the British public is not fit for purpose and must be removed from government office with immediate effect.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked.
